original_text: Did I conceive all this people? Did I give them birth, that you should say to me, ‘Carry them in your bosom, as a nurse carries a nursing child,’ to the land that you swore to give their fathers?
korean_text: 이 모든 백성을 내가 배었나이까 내가 그들을 낳았나이까 어찌 주께서 내게 양육하는 아버지가 젖 먹는 아이를 품듯 그들을 품에 품고 주께서 그들의 열조에게 맹세하신 땅으로 가라 하시나이까

sentences.original_text: Did I conceive all this people?
that you should say to me,
as a nurse carries a nursing child,'
that you swore to give their fathers?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그들의 조상에게 주겠다고 맹세한 그 땅으로?
